relation: I have never seen any car break ins or nothing like that. Security is constantly patrolling the campus.
I think you get alot of bang for your buck. The tuition is not high. It will save you some money to go here before a 4 year university.
There are some fast few restaurants within ten minutes away. There is a grill located on campus. There are also vending machines on campus.
There are no dorms since it is a community college.
The course work at this school is challenging at times .But it can be done if you stay focused. Also, just stay dedicated to your work you will succeed here.
Go here with a focused mindset. Do not get caught up with any of the students. Just get your work done.
Southeastern Community College is a great school. It is a great school to start out at. The key is to just stay focused.
pageTitle: Southeastern Community College - North Carolina Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: The teachers are excellent. Help is always available. They provide a wide array of opportunities. Login to rate or flag the reviews Zachary from Fair Bluff, NC 01/11/2013 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 6 Categories Comments Campus Safety The college has security guards that patrol the campus all times of the day and night. They keep a check on parking passes and anyone without an ID badge. Greek Life I am not sure about any Greek life here at Southeastern. Clubs and Activities There are a few clubs and activities that are offered. The biggest activities are the baseball and softball games.
